TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadFileCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadFileCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以非同步方式上傳檔案。The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a file. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#6)] 上傳完成時，會呼叫下列方法。The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#7)]
